short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore the amazing world of Pokémon while surfing the web with dynamic gradients, information & more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With PokeTab, you can bring your favourite Pokémon straight to your browser and turn your new tab page into a colourful Pokémon experience. See a randomly chosen Pokémon with its own colour scheme, comprehensive details, and more each time you open a new tab.

Designed to be sleek & minimal, Poketab has rich features that we know you will love.

Encounter a new Pokemon and their distinct colors in an eye-catching gradient every time you open a new tab. 

In depth details about the pokemon on screen.

Have a favorite generation? You can filter out some or all generations & only have your favorite one show up. 

Keep track of pokemon encounters with the inbuilt tracker system. Choose your team of 6 & take on the web, level up & collect experience with every encounter.

Completely customisable weather, date & time, whether you want fahrenheit or celsius, prefer long or short format dates, are a 24 hour lover or hater, there is plenty of customisation. With all the data being pulled from your local machine & the OpenWeeatherAPI.

Why Choose PokeTab?

PokeTab is designed for Trainers who want to add a touch of Pokémon magic to their everyday browsing. With its rich features and customization options, PokeTab offers a unique, engaging, and visually appealing experience for you, everytime.

How It Works

Automatic Updates: PokeTab checks for new Pokémon data monthly to ensure you always have the latest information.
Offline Functionality: PokeTab works offline with limited functionality. You can still enjoy your Pokémon encounters, but images may not render.
Privacy First: All data is stored locally on your device. We never access or sell your data.

Installation

Add PokeTab to Chrome from the Chrome Web Store.
Open a new tab and start enjoying random Pokémon encounters.
Customize your settings by clicking the Pokéball icon in the top right corner.
Bring the world of Pokémon to your browser with PokeTab and make every new tab a delightful surprise.
